controls.title: Entitlement
controls.description: Establish comprehensive identity and access management policies for Athena service access with proper entitlement management

implementation.description: Configure IAM policies with least privilege access to Athena resources, implement role-based access control (RBAC) for query execution and data access

controls.title: Data Governance
controls.description: Implement data classification and governance for data accessed through Athena

implementation.description: Define data classification schemas in S3 bucket policies and implement lifecycle rules for query results stored in result buckets

controls.title: Entitlement
controls.description: Ensure proper encryption key management and entitlements for all Athena operations

implementation.description: Configure S3 bucket encryption for data sources and result locations, enable SSL/TLS for Athena API calls and JDBC/ODBC connections

controls.title: Log Capture and Analysis
controls.description: Implement comprehensive monitoring and logging for Athena service usage

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail logging for Athena API calls, configure CloudWatch metrics for query performance and cost monitoring

controls.title: Vulnerability / Patch Management
controls.description: Implement vulnerability scanning and threat detection for Athena workloads

implementation.description: Use AWS Security Hub and GuardDuty to monitor for suspicious query patterns and unauthorized access attempts

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to Athena resources

implementation.description: Implement fine-grained IAM policies with resource-level permissions for databases, tables, and workgroups in Athena

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information

implementation.description: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.2+ for all Athena API communications and client connections

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Ensure auditable events are defined and logged appropriately

implementation.description: Configure CloudTrail to log all Athena API calls including StartQueryExecution, GetQueryResults, and workgroup management activities

controls.title: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at external boundaries of the system

implementation.description: Configure VPC endpoints for Athena service access and implement network ACLs to restrict access to authorized networks

controls.title: System Backup
controls.description: Conduct backups of system-level information contained in the system

implementation.description: Implement backup strategies for Athena metadata catalogs and ensure S3 data sources have appropriate backup and versioning enabled

controls.title: Athena workgroups should be encrypted at rest
controls.description: Athena workgroups should have encryption at rest enabled for query results

implementation.description: Configure workgroups with ResultConfiguration encryption using SSE-S3, SSE-KMS, or CSE-KMS encryption

controls.title: S3 general purpose buckets should have block public access settings enabled
controls.description: S3 buckets used by Athena should have Block Public Access enabled

implementation.description: Enable S3 Block Public Access settings on all buckets used for Athena data sources and query results

controls.title: IAM policies should not allow full administrative privileges
controls.description: IAM policies for Athena access should follow principle of least privilege

implementation.description: Create specific IAM policies for Athena that grant only necessary permissions for query execution and data access

controls.title: CloudTrail should be enabled and configured with at least one multi-Region trail
controls.description: Enable CloudTrail logging to capture Athena API calls across all regions

implementation.description: Configure multi-region CloudTrail with S3 bucket logging and log file validation for Athena service events

controls.title: AWS Config should be enabled
controls.description: AWS Config should be enabled to track configuration changes to Athena resources

implementation.description: Enable AWS Config to monitor changes to Athena workgroups, data catalogs, and associated IAM policies

controls.title: Athena workgroups should encrypt query results
controls.description: Athena workgroups must encrypt query results to protect sensitive data

implementation.description: Configure workgroup ResultConfiguration with EncryptionConfiguration using appropriate KMS keys

controls.title: S3 buckets should block public access
controls.description: S3 buckets used with Athena should have public access blocked

implementation.description: Apply bucket policies and Block Public Access settings to prevent unauthorized access to Athena data sources

controls.title: IAM customer managed policies should not allow decryption actions on all KMS keys
controls.description: Restrict KMS key access in IAM policies used for Athena encryption

implementation.description: Create specific IAM policies that grant decrypt permissions only for KMS keys used by Athena workgroups

controls.title: A log metric filter and alarm should exist for usage of root user
controls.description: Monitor root user access to Athena services through CloudWatch alarms

implementation.description: Create CloudWatch metric filters and alarms to detect root user access to Athena resources

controls.title: VPC flow logging should be enabled in all VPCs
controls.description: Enable VPC flow logs to monitor network traffic to Athena VPC endpoints

implementation.description: Configure VPC flow logs for subnets containing Athena VPC endpoints to monitor network access patterns

cost.name: AWS Athena Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Implement Query Result Caching
controls.description: Enable query result caching to avoid re-running identical queries and reduce data scanning costs

implementation.description: Configure workgroups to enable query result reuse and set appropriate cache TTL values based on data refresh patterns

controls.title: Optimize Data Storage Format
controls.description: Use columnar storage formats like Parquet or ORC to reduce data scanning and improve query performance

implementation.description: Convert data sources to Parquet or ORC format with appropriate compression algorithms (SNAPPY, GZIP) to minimize storage costs and query execution time

controls.title: Implement Data Partitioning
controls.description: Partition data to limit the amount of data scanned during query execution

implementation.description: Design partition schemes based on common query patterns (date, region, department) and ensure queries include partition predicates to limit scanning

controls.title: Configure Workgroup Query Limits
controls.description: Set data usage controls and query limits to prevent runaway queries and unexpected costs

implementation.description: Configure workgroup settings with BytesScannedCutoffPerQuery limits and enable query result location enforcement to control costs

controls.title: Optimize Query Performance
controls.description: Write efficient queries to minimize data scanning and execution time

implementation.description: Use specific column selection instead of SELECT *, implement appropriate WHERE clauses, and utilize LIMIT clauses for exploratory queries

controls.title: Implement S3 Lifecycle Policies
controls.description: Configure lifecycle policies for query results and temporary data to reduce storage costs

implementation.description: Set up S3 lifecycle rules to automatically transition query results to cheaper storage classes (IA, Glacier) or delete them after defined retention periods

controls.title: Monitor and Alert on Query Costs
controls.description: Implement cost monitoring and alerting to track Athena usage and spending patterns

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch metrics and billing alerts for Athena data scanning costs, and use AWS Cost Explorer to analyze usage patterns by workgroup and user

controls.title: Use Approximate Functions When Appropriate
controls.description: Utilize approximate aggregate functions for large datasets when exact precision is not required

implementation.description: Replace exact functions like COUNT DISTINCT with approximate functions like approx_distinct() for large dataset analysis to reduce query execution time and costs

VPC flow logging should be enabled in all VPCs
